paper_abstract: We show that a generalized quadrangle of order (s, t) with a center of transitivity is an elation generalized quadrangle if s <= t. In order to obtain this result, we generalize Frohardt's result on Kantor's conjecture from elation quadrangles to the more general case of quadrangles with a center of transitivity.
paper_title: A generalized quadrangle of order (s, t) with center of transitivity is an elation quadrangle if s <= t
